articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: More Deaths, No Benefit from Malaria Drug in VA Virus Study - Snopes.com
articles.description: A malaria drug widely touted by President Donald Trump for treating the new coronavirus showed no benefit in a large analysis of its use in U.S. veterans hospitals.
articles.content: A malaria drug widely touted by President Donald Trump for treating the new coronavirus showed no benefit in a large analysis of its use in U.S. veterans hospitals. There were more deaths among those given hydroxychloroquine versus standard care, researchers … [+2177 chars]
